qLoose.desc: This property is set to true if the table is loose.

qNoOfRows.desc: Number of rows in the table.

qFields.desc: Information about the fields in the table.

qPos.desc: Information about the position of the table.

qIsDirectDiscovery.desc:
If set to true, Direct Discovery is used. 
Direct Discovery fields are not loaded into memory and remain in the external database.

qIsSynthetic.desc: This property is set to true if the table contains a synthetic key.
